attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app my dog immediately took my phone and dug a whole and buried it. after digging to get it back i got a text from my gf saying we had to break up. my dog after seeing i dug my phone up and still had the app, promptly proceeded to poop in my bed and then he committed seppuku . please if u value ur life and ur sanity do not download this app!
